ygData.subject: Re: Regular IGL - Hot Rod VS Dragonfly
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I agree. I think we have Jer to thank for that.  Yesterday s post was a wakeup call.  I think he was right that the RPG had nearly come to a halt.

OOC: I agree. I think we have Jer to thank for that.  Yesterday's post was a 
wakeup call.  I think he was right that the RPG had nearly come to a halt.

--part1_f9.f3e6f0c.28cc56a9_boundary
